data.title: Civilization VI Customization Wiki
authors: Contributors to Civilization VI Customization Wiki
data.meta_description: A list of mods that focus on adding new City-States. All city-states available on Civfanatics and Steam.
data.text: Icon City-State Type Suzerain Bonus Notes CFC Steam Gaochang Trade +2 Gold and +1 Faith from desert tiles. +4 Gold, +2 Food and +1 Faith from oasis tiles. East Silk Road CS Pack CFC Steam Jiaohe Religious Relics yield +9 Faith (as opposed to the normal +4) in cities with walls. East Silk Road CS Pack CFC Steam Kroran Industrial All districts provide +1 Production in addition to their normal yields. East Silk Road CS Pack CFC Steam San Marino Cultural Great Works of Music provide +2 additional culture. Modern CS Pack CFC Steam Vatican City Religious Theater Squares yield Faith equal to their Culture output, and Holy Sites yield Culture equal to their Faith output. Modern CS Pack CFC Steam Singapore Trade Gain +2 Happiness in each city. Modern CS Pack CFC Steam Icon City-State Type Suzerain Bonus Notes Beikthano Militaristic Your fortified cities gain +4 Ranged Strength and +8 City Defense Strength. Pyu City-State Pack Halin Cultural Your Great Works of Writing generate +2 Science. Pyu City-State Pack Maingmaw Trade Rivers provide +1 Food and +1 Gold to adjacent flat-land tiles within your borders. Pyu City-State Pack Sri Ksetra Religious Your Holy Sites provide Food equal to their Faith adjacency bonus. Pyu City-State Pack Sidon Industrial Receive 2 Glass luxury resources, which provide 4 Amenities. Your Plantations receive +1 Production. Canaanite City-State Pack Tyre Trade Your City Centers gain +1 Food and +1 Production for each adjacent Coast tile. Canaanite City-State Pack Akko Scientific Your land units receive +20 HP healing in land tiles adjacent to Coast. Canaanite City-State Pack Megiddo Militaristic Your Encampment districts add +1 Production and +2 Gold to international Trade Routes from that city. Canaanite City-State Pack Hadad Cultural Your cities gain +1 Housing, and your capital gains an additional +1 Housing per Era (starting in the Classical Era). Canaanite City-State Pack 2 Kadesh Militaristic Your Heavy Cavalry units gain the ability to push defending units back. Canaanite City-State Pack 2 Qatna Religious Your Capital generates +1 Great Engineer, Great Merchant, Great Scientist, and Great Writer points. Canaanite City-State Pack 2 Ugarit Trade Your Harbor buildings provide a burst of experience to naval units trained in that city. Canaanite City-State Pack 2 Anuradhapura Scientific Your Builders can now make Stupa improvements. Sri Lankan City-State Pack Kataragama Religious Gain +1 Influence point per turn toward city-state Envoys from cities with a Belief building. Sri Lankan City-State Pack Kelaniya Cultural Your Great Works of Art (Sculpture, Portrait, Landscape, and Religious) grant +2 Faith and +2 Gold in cities with a Holy Site district. Sri Lankan City-State Pack Tissamaharama Industrial Grants 2 Seric Iron resources, which grant +5 Combat Strength to Melee and Anti-Cavalry units. Sri Lankan City-State Pack Chan Chan Scientific Your Palace provides double yields as well as +1 Amenity and +1 Housing. South American City-State Pack Guapondelig Militaristic Your Melee, Anti-Cavalry, and Civilian units gain faster Movement on Hill terrain. South American City-State Pack Kuhikugu Cultural Your Farms gain +1 Food and +1 Gold if built adjacent to Rainforest. South American City-State Pack Teyuna Industrial Your Commercial Hub and Theater districts gain a Major adjacency bonus from Mountain tiles. South American City-State Pack Chetro Ketl Religious Your Builders can now make Great Kiva improvements. North American City-State Pack Etzanoa Trade Your Aqueduct and Neighborhood districts gain bonus Food based on their tile Appeal. North American City-State Pack
